name: Pleimer Forms The Game
description:
Forms come to life in this game. The Pleimer Forms franchise is on a mission to amuse and entertain everyone who loves art and fun.

Pleimer Forms The Game - It's a game set in the universe of forms, our first game in the franchise. The game's story is based on locating your child forms on the screen, where the child's photo to look for is informed. The father forms holding his son after the challenge, has the approval of the mother who was in the meeting. Come in this universe full of color and lots of love to have fun.

There are 10 levels with progressive increase in difficulty, 3 bonus levels for super brave players, being our ultra mode.

More news from the forms universe coming soon U U
